channel.title: Geoffrey A. Moore on Adrián Moreno Peña · Web & Mobile Developer, all-around coder

item.title: Crossing the Chasm
item.description: The book focuses on how to navigate the “chasm” between early adopters and mainstream customers and achieve mass market success; and how it’s key to succeed after a promising beginning with the most passionate (and forgiving) piece of the market.
